extDescription.message: Highlight new links and/or images on your favorite web pages!

ih_opt_chk_rgx.description: Input checkbox to check if the usee input string is regex [options]

tl_opt_nfo_rgx.message:
Regex allows to monitor multiple pages with only one line.
Click here to learn about it!
tl_opt_nfo_rgx.description: Tooltip next to the url input text [options]

ih_opt_ttl.description: Title of the url stored list [options]

ih_opt_chk_imgsizemax.description: Minimum pixel size for images to be saved, condition is width*height > minSize to be taken into account [options]

vl_opt_btn_add.description: Button value to store a new url [options]

ih_opt_btn_import.description: Button value to import user's configuration [options]

vl_opt_btn_export.description: Button value to export user's configuration [options]

lr_err_deldb.message: An error occured, the IndexedDb deletion failed.
lr_err_deldb.description: Alert message if deleting an indexedDb triggered by the trash button failed because of the IndexedDb interaction [options]

lr_err_malformedurl.description: Alert message if deleting an indexedDb triggered by the trash button failed because the url is malformed [options]

lr_err_fromdb.description: Alert message if deleting an indexedDb triggered by the trash button failed because the url has been not found in chrome.storage.sync [options]

notif_title.description: Browser notification used in case the user performs an invalid procedure, or an error occurs [options]

notif_err_notLnkNorImg.message: Please check at least one type of element to monitor (i.e. image or link).
notif_err_notLnkNorImg.description: Neither image nor links checkbox is checked [options]

notif_err_noProtocls.message: The url given has no protocols (i.e. http:// or https://)
notif_err_noProtocls.description: The url given by the user has no protocols (i.e. http:// or https://) [options]

notif_err_unproperRegex.message: The regex given is not valid.
notif_err_unproperRegex.description: The regex given by the user is not valid [options]

notif_err_dbRemove_succ.message: This website's database has been removed. This tab will automatically be closed.

notif_err_dbRemove_fail.message: An error occured, this website's database could not be removed:

notif_err_protocolsRemove_fail.message:
Impossible to remove protocols from this URL.
Check your URL again.
notif_err_protocolsRemove_fail.description: Remove protocols from the input URL fails [options]

notif_err_sldtld.message: The url given has no second-level or top-level domain (e.g. "google" or "com" from the https://www.google.com url).
notif_err_sldtld.description: The url given by the user has no second-level or top-level domain [options]

cnfrm_delEntryRgx.message: Are you sure to remove this entry?
cnfrm_delEntryRgx.description: Ask the user confirmation to remove this stored regex [options]

cnfrm_delEntryStrict.message:
Are you sure to remove this entry?
The website will be automatically opened to remove the images and/or links database, and then closed.
cnfrm_delEntryStrict.description: Ask the user confirmation to remove this stored URL, then open the website and erase the IndexedDb [options]

cnfrm_err_sldtld.message:
The url given has no second-level or top-level domain (e.g. "google" or "com" from the https://www.google.com url).
Are you sure to continue?
cnfrm_err_sldtld.description: The regex given by the user has no second-level or top-level domain [options]

prompt_err_sldtld.message: Please provide a second-level or top-level domain so this regex URL can be added to.
prompt_err_sldtld.description: Since the user gave a regex without any sld or tld, ask them which sld/tld to use for the URL stored list [options]
